original_title: Alice Cooper na Wacken Open Air 2013
overview: Thanks to his elaborate concerts, Alice Cooper is among the artists whose performances are widely attended. It was no different in 2013 during the Wacken festival, where the world's rock and metal scene flourished. Together with the American rocker, Rammstein, Deep Purple, Mot√∂rhead or Anthrax performed at the festival. Alice Cooper offered a great show during which he played his hits like Hello Hooray, House of Fire, No More Mr. Nice Guy or Hey Stoopid.
title: Alice Cooper na Wacken Open Air 2013
